name: Kenshi

files.installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG

task.name: winetricks
task.app: corefonts d3dx11_42 d3dx11_43 ogg physx vcrun6sp6 vb6run vcrun2003 vcrun2005

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the EXE downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Kenshi/kenshi_GOG_x64.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts d3dx11_42 d3dx11_43 ogg physx vcrun6sp6 vb6run vcrun2003 vcrun2005
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running Setup
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
wine:
  dxvk: true
